overview: Mia Westphal is to become editor-in-chief of a women's magazine . But when her ex Edgar snatches the job from her, Mia has an idea : if she finds a better story than Edgar within the next three months , she 'll get his job. For this purpose she reports _to the ad of a millionaire who is looking for a woman capable of procreation - not realizing that this is a resourceful journalist who is also looking for a spectacular story ...
title: Mia and the Millionaire
